recipesJson.name: MlNikon's Roasted Hazelnuts
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: The main hazelnut profile is provided by fw hazelnut with wf roasted hazelnut. I used WF roasted pecans and cream to add a nice toasty roasted note and flv beer nuts is added to add some salty goodness to the mix for an added touch of authenticity
